question: The Networked Readiness Index (NRI) is published by:
option4: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
explanation: India was placed at 91st position in the recently released 2016 Networked Readiness Index (NRI) by the Geneva-based World Economic Forum (WEF). The index was released as the part of the WEF’s Global Information Technology Report. It measures countries’ success in creating the necessary conditions for a transition to a digitised economy and society.
